`pandas` provides 2 functions for reshaping data:   

-  <a href="https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.melt.html" target="_blank">`.melt()`</a> to make wide dataframe long (convert columns to row) 
- <a href="https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/reference/api/pandas.DataFrame.pivot.html" target="_blank">`.pivot()`</a>  to make long data wide (convert rows to columns)
